1: -module(dungeon_base_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -author('Yue Marvin Tao').
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: -export([all/0]).
    7: -export([add_new_player_test/0, random_name/0]).
    8: 
    9: all() ->
   10:     [add_new_player_test].
   11: 
   12: random_name() ->
   13:     SurNames = [
   14:         {1, <<"威猛的"/utf8>>}, {2, <<"霸道的"/utf8>>}, {3, <<"机智的"/utf8>>}, {4, <<"勇敢的"/utf8>>}, {5, <<"无敌的"/utf8>>},
   15:         {6, <<"可爱的"/utf8>>}, {7, <<"呆萌的"/utf8>>}, {8, <<"天然的"/utf8>>}, {9, <<"干练的"/utf8>>}, {10, <<"飒爽的"/utf8>>}
   16:     ],
   17:     Given = [
   18:         {1, <<"总裁"/utf8>>}, {2, <<"战士"/utf8>>}, {3, <<"魔法使"/utf8>>}, {4, <<"隐士"/utf8>>}, {5, <<"高人"/utf8>>},
   19:         {6, <<"科学家"/utf8>>}, {7, <<"学霸"/utf8>>}, {8, <<"天才"/utf8>>}, {9, <<"学生会长"/utf8>>}, {10, <<"体育部长"/utf8>>}
   20:     ],
   21: 
   22:     {_, [{_, ResSurname}|_]} = lists:splitwith(fun({ID, _Name}) -> ID < rand:uniform() * length(SurNames) end, SurNames),
   23:     {_, [{_, ResGiven}|_]} = lists:splitwith(fun({ID, _Name}) -> ID < rand:uniform() * length(Given) end, Given),
   24: 
   25:     list_to_binary([ResSurname,ResGiven]).
   26: 
   27: add_new_player_test() ->
   28:     Conn = dungeon_base:connect(),
   29: 
   30:     % Name = random_name(),
   31:     % {ok, ColumnNumber} = dungeon_base:get_number_of_columns(Conn, Name),
   32:     %
   33:     % CheckedName = case ColumnNumber of
   34:     %     <<"0">> -> Name;
   35:     %     Other -> list_to_binary([Name, Other])
   36:     % end,
   37:     %
   38:     % NewID = uuid:uuid_to_string(uuid:get_v4_urandom()),
   39:     %
   40:     % {ok, new_player_added} = dungeon_base:add_new_player(Conn, NewID, CheckedName),
   41:     % {ok, new_chest_record_created} = dungeon_base:add_chest_record(Conn, NewID),
   42:     %
   43:     dungeon_base:close().
